dialogue.htmlContent:

Finally, a male arachne makes an appearance. Jet-black chitin and skin, heavily pierced with gold, a huge, precum-drooling cock extends from beneath his spider body.

Arachne ties you up and spanks hard. Makes you squeal then rams huge dildo in your ass/pussy.

Yui returns. Tells you all to get cleaned up as clients will arrive in 30 mins.

Shower and change into clean latex outfit.

Clients arrive and fuck you all. This is your life, as a slave to Yui. Used by her other toys and clients. Only time you're not engaged in kinky sex is while sleeping, and even then sometimes you're used.
